title: Not sure if effective to hold Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg responsible: Former FTC Commissioner
text: Former FTC Commissioner and former advisor to Facebook Mozelle Thompson joins 'Squawk Alley' to discuss the $5 billion fine Facebook could be facing from the FTC.

title: Like Everything Else, FTC Probes Won’t Hurt Facebook Stock Long Term
text: Half of Facebook, Inc.’s headlines this year seem to take place in a Congressional setting and the half in its home base in the Silicon Valley.

title: Facebook implements livestream restrictions, some say it's not enough
text: Elevation Partners co-founder, Roger McNamee, who mentored Mark Zuckerberg, on Facebook’s move to restrict livestreams for users that break the rules.

title: Facebook restricts live streaming in response to criticism over terrorist content
text: Facebook will impose a “one-strike” rule that will block users who have recently posted or shared terrorist propaganda from broadcasting live video on its service.

title: Facebook introduces ‘one strike’ policy to combat abuse of its live-streaming service
text: Facebook is cracking down on its live streaming service after it was used to broadcast the shocking mass shootings that left 50 dead at two Christchurch mosques in New Zealand in March.
